works.complaint:
My name is Zafar Ali. I am a barrister practising
from 23 Essex Street Chambers in London. When the search terms 'Zafar Ali
Barrister' are put into Google, the above two links appear. These pages
allege anti-Semitism on the part of a 'Zafar Ali barrister'. There is a
photograph on one of the pages and you can see from my web profile that
this is not me. However as you will understand, to those who have not
met me but google my name, these pages are incredibly damaging to my
practice and reputation, and amount to libel. Please take whatever steps
necessary to remove these pages from a Google search. I understand that
the  
man
who runs the site, Dr Howard Fredrics, has been convicted of harassment
against Sir Peter Scott (the website is named www.sirpeterscott.com) for  
running this website.
  http://www.sirpeterscott.com/antisemitism.html
  http://www.sirpeterscott.com/zafarali.html

I have a good faith belief that the
information specified above is not permitted by applicable law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury,
that the information in this notification is accurate.

I look forward to hearing from you soon.
